member.summary: Printable page size (without margins)

member.summary: Header

member.summary: Footer

member.summary: Page currently printing

member.name: P:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.TotalPages
member.summary: Total pages printing

member.name: P:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.Range
member.summary: Page range to print

member.name: P:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.IsPageCountValid
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether is the total number of pages.
member.value: true if this instance is page count valid; otherwise, false.
member.returns: true if pagination is complete and is the total number of pages; otherwise, false, if pagination is in process and is the number of pages currently formatted (not the total).This value may revert to false, after being true, if or content changes; because those events would force a repagination.

member.name: P:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.PageCount
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a count of the number of pages currently formatted
member.returns: A count of the number of pages that have been formatted.

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.GetTranslatedPageNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Translates the index of the printed page to the actual page
member.remarks: Example: If only pages 3-5 are printed, then whenever the system requests page number 0, that is really the 3rd page (first in the printed range) and thus page index 2 has to be returned

member.name: P:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.PageSize
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the suggested width and height of each page.
member.returns: A representing the width and height of each page.

member.name: P:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.Source
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns the element being paginated.
member.returns: An representing the element being paginated.

member.name: M:CODE.Framework.Wpf.Documents.DocumentPaginatorEx.GetPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the for the specified page number.
member.param: The zero-based page number of the document page that is needed.
member.returns: The for the specified , or if the page does not exist.

member.summary: Renders the element to the provided page (container).
